message: I propose we split the money 60/40.  It's a fair deal that gives us both a good portion.
Let's split it 55/45. It's a more even deal considering the inflation.
Bob, time is running out. My last offer was fair, but let's meet in the middle.  58/42, take it or leave it.

Bob, I'm feeling the inflation pinch.  I'll accept your previous offer of 57/43.  Let's close this out.
You wanted to accept my previous offer, but got the numbers mixed up. I'll give you another chance, but this time I want 60/40.
